thread.title: Ex-Bulls GM Jerry Krause Dead at 77
thread.title_full: Ex-Bulls GM Jerry Krause Dead at 77 | TMZ.com

author: TMZ Staff
title: Ex-Bulls GM Jerry Krause Dead at 77
text:
Breaking News Ex-Chicago Bulls General Manager Jerry Krause -- who built the Bulls dynasty of the '90s -- has died, a family member confirmed. He was 77. 
The Chicago Tribune says Krause passed away Tuesday afternoon.
Krause was the 2-time NBA Executive of the Year and drafted Scottie Pippen and Horace Grant . 
But it wasn't all roses for Krause ... he famously locked horns with Pippen, Michael Jordan and Phil Jackson during his time in Chicago. 
Story developing ...
